features: Made from high-quality, food-grade silicone: Safe to use and free from harmful chemicals, ensuring the health and safety of you and your family.
Perfect fit for 8.5 inch air fryers: Designed to fit snugly in most 8.5 inch air fryers, providing maximum coverage and protection.
Non-stick surface: Prevents food from sticking to the liner, ensuring even cooking and making cleanup a breeze.
Easy to clean: Simply wipe down with a damp cloth after use, or pop it in the dishwasher for an even easier clean.
Multipurpose: Ideal for cooking a variety of foods such as chicken wings, roasted vegetables, and French fries, making it a versatile kitchen accessory.
body.description: TONET Silicone Air Fryer Liner WHY AIR FRYER SILICONE LINER? Introducing the Air Fryer Silicone Pot - the ultimate solution for hassle-free and healthy cooking! Air Fryers are renowned for their ability to make delicious, crispy fried foods with little to no oil. However, cleaning the fryer basket can be a daunting task. That's where the Air Fryer Silicone Pot comes in - designed to make your life easier by keeping your fryer clean and in perfect condition while ensuring every meal is perfectly cooked. Our silicone pot is made from high-quality materials and is designed to be both safe and high-performing. Our goal is to provide you with a product that delivers exceptional results without compromising on quality. Say goodbye to the hassle of cleaning and hello to perfectly cooked, healthy meals every time with the Air Fryer Silicone Pot.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: TONET Silicone Air Fryer Liner WHY AIR FRYER SILICONE LINER? Introducing the Air Fryer Silicone Pot - the ultimate solution for hassle-free and healthy cooking! Air Fryers are renowned for their ability to make delicious, crispy fried foods with little to no oil. However, cleaning the fryer basket can be a daunting task. That's where the Air Fryer Silicone Pot comes in - designed to make your life easier by keeping your fryer clean and in perfect condition while ensuring every meal is perfectly cooked. Our silicone pot is made from high-quality materials and is designed to be both safe and high-performing. Our goal is to provide you with a product that delivers exceptional results without compromising on quality. Say goodbye to the hassle of cleaning and hello to perfectly cooked, healthy meals every time with the Air Fryer Silicone Pot. 100% Food Grade Premium Material Made with food-safe, high-quality silicone for peace of mind. BPA-free, ensuring that your food is free from harmful chemicals. Highly heat-resistant from -40℉ to 446℉ for versatile cooking options. Non-stick surface to prevent food from sticking to the air fryer basket. Durable and long-lasting material for extended use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I’m in love with these sturdy silicone liners because I was NOT in love with cleaning my air fryer after every use. Forget those paper pieces of crap liners, the silicon ones wash easily by hand or dishwasher. Want to air fry two foods right after the other without having to wash in between? Get this 4-pack of liners.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Makes Clean-up Easier/Faster. Preferred to Parchment.
reviews.reviewText: We ordered the silicone air fryer liners specifically for our new Ninja AF161 Max XL Air Fryer (5.5 quart capacity). As you can see from the attached photos, they fit perfecly in the Ninja 5.5-quart model. We haven't had a lot of experience using them yet, but I can report that they make the cleanup process a lot easier -- which is undoubtedly the main reason for using them. So far, we've been cleaning them by hand after removing most of what's left in liner after cooking. We have also experimented with disposable parchment paper liners purchased on Amazon -- following certain posted guidelines to avoid using parchment during the preheating process. At this point, we prefer using the silicone liners. I'll update my review as we become more experienced and knowledgeable with our air fryer. Apparently, we're late to the air-fryer party, and a have a lot of catching up to do. In the meantime, I'd rate these at a solid 4.5, rounding up to 5 stars. Be sure to comparison shop on price, since there are many options for sale on Amazon.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works as stated
reviews.reviewText: This is a good product. Works as stated, and came in a set of 4.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Keeps your air fryer clean
reviews.reviewText: If you're an avid air fryer user like I am, you know how often you find yourself cleaning the basket. These non-stick silicone liners keep your fryer basket remarkably clean without any scrubbing. I like how well these fit inside without blocking air circulation. My food comes out cooked as if the liner didn't exist!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars FInally, no more cleaning this basket
reviews.reviewText: What a product. These have solved my age old hatred of cleaning the air fryer basket. Before, sometimes would be sitting there thinking about making some nice crispy fries in the air fryer, and then sigh and decide it isn't worth it.Let me tell you - my life has changed. I am actually eating some nice crispy fries and typing this review. Because I no longer have to worry about cleaning the air fryer basket, or deciding not to clean the air fryer basket and coming back 15 days later and having to clean it.You just pop this liner in. Put your food in. Cook the food. Put the liner in the dishwasher, and move on with your life. Fits perfect. Washes easily. Food cooks the same. Perfection.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Mannnn, why didn't I get these sooner?
reviews.reviewText: I have been using the paper liners, which are cool, but still a little messy and don't always keep the entire inside of the basket clean. This did! I made breaded zucchini in the air fryer and only had to remove the silicone liner. There was zero spillage for me to clean up in the basket. The paper liners aren't really eco-friendly, either, so I feel better about the silicone being washable and resusable. And with four, if it goes in the dishwasher and isn't washed right away, I can still use another one to make something else in the fryer before I HAVE to wash one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Reusable Air Fryer Pans - Clean Up is Fast & Easy
reviews.reviewText: What I like is clean up is fast and easy even with the greasiest foods. The other thing I like is the pans are super roomy and fit nicely in my large air fry easily. I like they are re-useable. And the fact they come in a 4 pack for what you usually pay for 2 is a double bonus. The colors are great too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: A little bit smaller than the drawer of my Power XL air fryer, but it gets the job done! Does an "ok" job of trapping oil in the groves in the bottom. These liners may not be the best choice when cooking greasy foods, like chicken wings, because the food will sit in the excess drippings/oil. I love the easy clean-up! Just let it cool, use a paper towel to scrape the grease into the trash, then pop the liner in the dishwasher.
